MUD documentation¶

Contains logic for MUD game.

class MUD.logic.Monster(name, hp, x, y)¶

Monster in coordinates x, y named ‘name’, with hp.

decrease_hp()¶

Hurt monster.

class MUD.logic.Player(x=0, y=0)¶

Player which can move.

down()¶

Move down.

left()¶

Move left.

print_move_error()¶

Print move error.

print_player()¶

Print players coordinates.

right()¶

Move right.

up()¶

Move up.

MUD.logic.completion_list(prefix, source)¶

Create list to complete line.

Module to run MUD cmd.

class MUD.game.repl¶

Class to run cmd.

complete_add(prefix, allcommand, beg, end)¶

Compete cmd add.

complete_attack(prefix, allcommand, beg, end)¶

Complete cmd attack.

complete_move(prefix, allcommand, beg, end)¶

Complete cmd move.

complete_show(prefix, allcommand, beg, end)¶

Complete cmd show.

do_add(arg)¶

Add monster with name and hp in coordinates.

do_attack(arg)¶

Attack monster with ‘name’.

do_exit(arg)¶

Exit command line.

do_move(arg)¶

Move up, down, left or right.

do_show(arg)¶

Show all monsters in dungeon.

print_monsters(x, y)¶

Print all monsters in cell.
